00129   public static function initialize( $options = array() )
00130   {
00131     //  Initialize my variables...
00132     self::$_thisApp = Yii::app();
00133 
00134     //  Individually, each of these may or may not be available...
00135     try
00136     {
00137       if ( null !== self::$_thisApp )
00138         self::$_clientScript = self::$_thisApp->getClientScript();
00139     }
00140     catch ( CXLException $_ex )
00141     {
00142     }
00143 
00144     try
00145     {
00146       if ( null !== self::$_thisApp )
00147         self::$_thisUser = self::$_thisApp->getUser();
00148     }
00149     catch ( CXLException $_ex )
00150     {
00151     }
00152 
00153     try
00154     {
00155       if ( null !== self::$_thisApp )
00156         self::$_thisRequest = self::$_thisApp->getRequest();
00157     }
00158     catch ( CXLException $_ex )
00159     {
00160     }
00161 
00162     try
00163     {
00164       if ( null !== self::$_thisApp )
00165         self::$_appParameters = self::$_thisApp->getParams();
00166     }
00167     catch ( CXLException $_ex )
00168     {
00169     }
00170 
00171     //  Add our logging class to the class path
00172     self::addClassToPath( 'yiixl.core.helpers.CXLHash' );
00173     self::addClassToPath( 'yiixl.core.helpers.CXLLogHelper' );
00174   }

00199   {
00200     $_defaultValue = null;
00201 
00202     foreach ( func_get_args() as $_argument )
00203     {
00204       if ( null === $_argument ) return $_argument;
00205       $_defaultValue = $_argument;
00206     }
00207 
00208     return $_defaultValue;

00272   public static function o( &$options = array( ), $key, $defaultValue = null, $unsetValue = false )
00273   {
00274     $_newValue = $defaultValue;
00275 
00276     if ( is_array( $options ) )
00277     {
00278       if ( ! array_key_exists( $key, $options ) )
00279       {
00280         //  Ignore case and look...
00281         $_newKey = strtolower( $key );
00282 
00283         foreach ( $options as $_key => $_value )
00284         {
00285           if ( strtolower( $_key ) == $_newKey )
00286           {
00287             //  Set correct key and break
00288             $key = $_key;
00289             break;
00290           }
00291         }
00292       }
00293 
00294       if ( isset( $options[$key] ) )
00295       {
00296         $_newValue = $options[$key];
00297         if ( $unsetValue ) unset( $options[$key] );
00298       }
00299 
00300       //  Set it in the array if not an unsetter...
00301       if ( !$unsetValue ) $options[$key] = $_newValue;
00302     }
00303 
00304     //  Return...
00305     return $_newValue;
00306   }

00560   public static function _rsf( $urlList, $pagePosition = CClientScript::POS_HEAD, $fromPublished = false )
00561   {
00562     if ( !is_array( $urlList ) ) $urlList = array( $urlList );
00563     $_prefix = ( $fromPublished ? XL::getExternalLibraryUrl() . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR : null );
00564 
00565     //  Need external library?
00566     foreach ( $urlList as $_url )
00567     {
00568       if ( $_url[0] != '/' && $fromPublished ) $_url = $_prefix . $_url;
00569 
00570       if ( !self::$_clientScript->isScriptFileRegistered( $_url ) ) self::$_clientScript->registerScriptFile( $_url, $pagePosition );
00571     }
00572   }

01052   public static function _sqlAllScalar( $sql, $parameterList = null, $dbToUse = null )
01053   {
01054     $_resultList = null;
01055 
01056     if ( null !== ( $_db = XL::nvl( $dbToUse, self::$_thisApp->getDb() ) ) )
01057     {
01058       if ( null !== ( $_rowList = $_db->createCommand( $sql )->queryAll( true, $parameterList ) ) )
01059       {
01060         $_resultList = array( );
01061 
01062         foreach ( $_rowList as $_row ) $_resultList[] = $_row[0];
01063       }
01064     }
01065 
01066     return $_resultList;
01067   }

01135   public static function filterInt( $value, $nullIfZero = true, $min = null, $max = null )
01136   {
01137     $_value = false;
01138 
01139     if ( false !== ( $_value = filter_var( $value, FILTER_SANITIZE_NUMBER_INT ) ) )
01140     {
01141       if ( null !== $min && $_value < $min ) return false;
01142 
01143       if ( null !== $max && $_value > $max ) return false;
01144 
01145       if ( $nullIfZero && 0 == $_value ) return null;
01146     }
01147 
01148     return $_value;
01149   }

01163   public static function smartCall( CXLComponent $object, $method, $parameters = array() )
01164   {
01165     $_methods = $object->getBehaviorMethods();
01166     
01167     //  Make sure the function exists
01168     if ( is_callable( $_methodClass = XL::o( $_methods, $method, null, true ) ) )
01169     {
01170       //  Throw myself at the front of the arguments
01171       $_newParameters = $parameters;
01172       
01173       array_unshift( $_newParameters, $object );
01174 
01175       //  And call the method
01176       return call_user_func_array(
01177         array(
01178           $_methodClass,
01179           $method
01180         ),
01181         $_newParameters
01182       );
01183     }
01184 
01185     //  Otherwise let Yii deal with it...
01186     return self::smartCallStatic( $object, $method, $parameters );
01187   }
01188 
01198   public static function smartCallStatic( IXLComponent $object, $method, $parameters = array() )
01199   {
01200     //  Throw myself at the front of the arguments
01201     $_newParameters = $parameters;
01202 
01203     array_unshift( $_newParameters, $object );
01204 
01205     foreach ( self::$_classPath as $_class )
01206     {
01207       $_obj = new ReflectionClass( $_class );
01208       $_newParameters = ( $_obj->implementsInterface( 'IXLShifter' ) ? $_newParameters : $parameters );
01209       
01210       if ( is_callable( array( $_class, $method ) ) )
01211         return call_user_func_array( $_class . '::' . $method, $_newParameters );
01212     }
01213 
01214     throw new CXLMethodNotFoundException(
01215       XL::t(
01216         self::CLASS_LOG_TAG,
01217         'Method "{class}.{method}" is read only.',
01218         array(
01219           '{class}' => get_class( $object ),
01220           '{method}' => $method,
01221         )
01222       )
01223     );
01224   }
01225 
01236   public static function __callStatic( $method, $parameters )
01237   {
01238     foreach ( self::$_classPath as $_class )
01239     {
01240       if ( is_callable( array( $_class, $method ) ) )
01241         return call_user_func_array( $_class . '::' . $method, $parameters );
01242     }
01243     
01244     //  I give, it's all you...
01245     parent::__callStatic( $method, $parameters );
01246   }
01247 
01253   protected static function _serialize( $value )
01254   {
01255     try
01256     {
01257       if ( $value instanceof SimpleXMLElement || $value instanceof Util_SpXmlElement ) return $value->asXML();
01258 
01259       if ( is_object( $value ) ) return serialize( $value );
01260     }
01261     catch ( CXLException $_ex )
01262     {
01263 
01264     }
01265 
01266     return $value;
01267   }
01268 
01274   protected static function _unserialize( $value )
01275   {
01276     try
01277     {
01278       if ( self::_isSerialized( $value ) )
01279       {
01280         if ( $value instanceof SimpleXMLElement || $value instanceof Util_SpXmlElement ) return simplexml_load_string( $value );
01281 
01282         return unserialize( $value );
01283       }
01284     }
01285     catch ( CXLException $_ex )
01286     {
01287 
01288     }
01289 
01290     return $value;
01291   }
01292 
01298   protected static function _isSerialized( $value )
01299   {
01300     $_result = @unserialize( $value );
01301     return!( false === $_result && $value != serialize( false ) );
01302   }
01303 
01304 }
